about.description: NCG Alpha is a multidisciplinary real estate and urban development platform founded by Dr. Damien Nouvel. It unites six specialized entities that together cover the full development spectrum from market strategy to design, execution, education, innovation, and investment. Based in Riyadh and Dubai, NCG Alpha blends European academic rigor with GCC market insight to deliver integrated urban intelligence.
